prompts: Create a bipedal Pokemon with blue scales and sharp spikes running down its back.
Show me a powerful poison-type creature with a fierce look and a sturdy build.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous environments and has a defensive combat style.
Imagine a Pokemon that has a calming blue appearance and a nurturing personality.
Generate a creature that combines elegance with strength, featuring spikes and a robust tail.
Make a water-resistant Pokemon that is found in wetlands and displays a strong maternal instinct.
Give me a Pokemon that has both poison and ground abilities, perfect for versatility in battles.
